Returns pricing, limits, and features for each tier.
Prices are fetched from Stripe and cached for 1 hour.
This endpoint is public (no auth required) for pricing pages.

get.description: Get all matrices for a specific workspace.

Get all entity sets for a matrix with their members.

This endpoint provides complete entity set information needed by the frontend to:
1. Determine matrix dimensionality
2. Construct entity_set_filters for tile batch queries
3. Map entity IDs (document/question IDs) to entity set member IDs
Get cell statistics for a matrix (count by status).
Get matrix cells with optional filtering by document_id or question_id.

schema.title: Response Get Matrix Cells Api V1 Matrices  Matrixid  Cells Get

get.description: Get all matrix cells with their current answers for a specific question (entity-ref based).

schema.title: Response Get Matrix Cells By Question

post.description: Reprocess matrix cells based on the specified criteria.
Soft delete matrix entities (documents, questions, or matrices) and their related cells.
Duplicate a matrix with specified duplication type (documents only, questions only, or full matrix).

get.description: Get template variables for a matrix (used for duplication form).

schema.title: Response Get Matrix Template Variables Api V1 Matrices  Matrixid  Template Variables Get

get.description:
Get matrix structure metadata for understanding cell data.

Provides information about:
- Matrix type and dimensionality
- Entity sets (what entities are on each axis)
- Entity roles (DOCUMENT, LEFT, RIGHT, QUESTION)
- System placeholders (@{{LEFT}}, @{{RIGHT}})
- Cell structure (what data each cell contains)

This helps workflow agents understand how to interpret matrix data
when generating documents from cell data.

patch.description:
Update the label of an entity set member.

Labels are per-matrix context - the same entity (document/question) can have
different labels in different entity sets/matrices.

post.description: Create a new template variable for a matrix.

get.description: Get all template variables for a matrix.
Get template variables with usage count for a matrix.

schema.title: Response Get Template Variables With Usage Api V1 Matrices  Matrixid  Template Variables With Usage Get

get.description: Get a specific template variable by ID.

patch.description: Update a template variable and reprocess affected questions.

delete.description: Delete a template variable (only if not in use).

get.description: Get list of question IDs that would be affected by changes to this template variable.

schema.title: Response Get Affected Questions Api V1 Template Variables  Variableid  Affected Questions Get

post.description:
Queue matrix cells in PENDING state for processing.

If matrix_id is provided in the request, only queues cells for that specific matrix.
Otherwise, queues all pending cells across all matrices.

Upload answer from agent QA container.

This endpoint is called by agent QA containers running in K8s jobs.
The agent POSTs its answer directly after processing completes.
Queue all pending documents for extraction processing.

schema.title: Response Queue Pending Documents Api V1 Extraction Queue Pending Post

post.description: Retry failed extraction jobs by restarting Temporal workflows.

schema.title: Response Retry Failed Extractions Api V1 Extraction Retry Failed Post

get.description: Get extraction job details.
Get extraction status for a document.

Get chunk metadata for a document (without content).

Returns a list of all chunk IDs and metadata for the document,
allowing agents to discover available chunks before reading specific ones.

post.description:
Upload chunks from chunking agent container.

This endpoint is called by chunking agent containers running in K8s jobs.
The agent POSTs chunks after processing completes.

get.description:
Read the full content of a specific chunk.

Agents should use list_document_chunks first to discover available chunks,
then read specific chunks as needed for answering questions.

Search chunks by metadata filters (section, page, etc.).

Useful for agents to narrow down relevant chunks before reading content.

Hybrid search across chunks using BM25 + vector search.

Combines keyword matching (BM25) with semantic similarity (vector embeddings)
using Reciprocal Rank Fusion to rank results. Searches across all documents
the user has access to within their company.

Returns chunks with relevance scores, ordered by combined ranking.

post.description: Create a new workflow.

get.description: List all workflows for a workspace.

schema.title: Response List Workflows Api V1 Workspaces  Workspaceid  Workflows Get

get.description: Get a workflow by ID.

post.description:
Execute a workflow.

Creates an execution record and starts a Temporal workflow that will:
1. Create a service account
2. Launch a gVisor-sandboxed K8s pod with Claude Agent
3. Monitor execution
4. Extract generated files
5. Clean up resources

get.description: List all executions for a workflow.

schema.title: Response List Executions Api V1 Workflows  Workflowid  Executions Get

get.description: Get workflow execution status and results.
List files generated by an execution.

schema.title: Response List Execution Files Api V1 Workflows  Workflowid  Executions  Executionid  Files Get

Upload an execution output file directly to storage.

Called by workflow agent to upload files after completion.

get.description: Download an execution file.

post.description: Upload an input file (template, data file) for a workflow.

get.description: List all input files for a workflow.

schema.title: Response List Input Files Api V1 Workflows  Workflowid  Input Files Get

get.description: Download an input file.

post.description:
Generate presigned upload URLs for execution output files.

Called by workflow agent after completing to get URLs for uploading files + manifest.

Upload execution manifest JSON to storage.

Called by workflow agent after uploading all files.
Create a new conversation.

schema.title: Response Get Active Conversations Api V1 Agents Conversations  Get

get.description: Get a conversation by ID.

schema.title: Response Get Conversation Messages Api V1 Agents Conversations  Conversationid  Messages  Get

schema.title: Response Send Message To Agent Api V1 Agents Conversations  Conversationid  Messages  Post

post.description: Manually add a message to a conversation (for testing/debugging).

get.description: Get all available tools.

schema.title: Response Get Available Tools Api V1 Agents Tools  Get

get.description: Get tools in OpenAI function calling format.

post.description: Execute a tool with the given parameters (for testing).

get.description:
Get current subscription status for the company.

Returns subscription tier, status, and access information.
If no subscription exists, creates a FREE tier subscription.

Get detailed usage statistics for the company.

Returns current usage counts, limits, and percentages for all 4 quota types.
If no subscription exists, creates a FREE tier subscription.

Check current cell operation quota status.

Returns detailed quota information for cell operations metric.
Raises 429 if quota exceeded.

post.description:
Create a Stripe checkout session or update existing subscription.

- No subscription / FREE tier → Checkout session for new subscription
- Paid tier → Update existing subscription (no new checkout)

Create a Stripe customer portal session.

Allows customers to manage payment methods, view invoices, cancel subscription.

Upgrade subscription tier.

Only admin users can upgrade tiers.

Cancel subscription.

Only admin users can cancel subscription.
Access continues until end of current billing period.

defined in packages.qa.models.domain.answer_data.

in the upload request.

EntityRole.title: EntityRole
EntityRole.description:
Roles that entities can play in a matrix cell.

This IS the axis identifier in N-dimensional matrices.
Each role represents a distinct dimension/axis.

EntitySetFilter.title: EntitySetFilter
EntitySetFilter.description:
Filter for entities in an entity set.

Role is REQUIRED - it identifies which axis/dimension this filter applies to.
For correlation matrices, the same entity_set_id appears multiple times
with different roles (e.g., LEFT and RIGHT both using the documents entity set).

MatrixDuplicateRequest.title: MatrixDuplicateRequest
MatrixDuplicateRequest.description:
Request schema for matrix duplication operations (entity-set based).

Specify which entity sets to duplicate members from. The new matrix
will have the same structure but only the selected entity sets will
be populated with members.

2. Construct entity_set_filters for tile queries

interpret cell data when fetching from the API.
